news.title: Year In Review: Three-Year Anniversary
news.caption: Our annual "Year in Review" article shares an overview of how the product, team, and community have evolved since this time last year. Give it a read for some interesting statistics, previews of upcoming work, and a recap of things you might have missed from the past few months.

news.title: V12 Patreon Vote, Prioritization, and Planning!
news.caption: The next major version of Foundry VTT will prioritize some major enhancements across a range of areas including Event Triggers, canvas rendering improvements, continued work on UI redesign, improvements to our dice rolling architecture, and some valuable server-side performance improvements.

news.title: Overview Video
news.caption: Watch a comprehensive video overview which summarizes the features of Foundry Virtual Tabletop.

news.title: Version 11 Stable Release
news.caption: Version 11 Stable 1 has now been released! Check out our release notes for everything you need to know.

news.title: Built-in Backup Support
news.caption: Foundry Virtual Tabletop now has built-in support for backing up your Worlds, Game Systems, and Modules from directly within the software with prompts for major version upgrades to make sure your data stays safe.

featuredContent.title: Use Quick Inserts for Quick Access to Everything!
featuredContent.caption: Quickly find characters, monsters, items, spells etc. and insert them wherever you need them right now - the map, character sheets, roll tables, journals, you name it.
